001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Configuration;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Logbook;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleDescriptorSupport;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
009import java.nio.file.Files;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.ArrayDeque;
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.util.Collections;
014import java.util.Deque;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Optional;
017import java.util.TreeMap;
018import java.util.function.Predicate;
019import java.util.regex.Pattern;
020import java.util.stream.Collectors;
021import java.util.stream.Stream;
022
023/** A directory-scanning factory of {@link Project} instances. */
024public record ProjectScanner(Bach bach, boolean treatSourcesAsResources) implements Logbook.Trait {
025
026  public ProjectScanner(Bach bach) {
027    this(bach, false);
028  }
029
030  private static final Pattern RELEASE_NUMBER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(".*?(\\d+)$");
031
032  @Override
033  public Logbook logbook() {
034    return bach.logbook();
035  }
036
037  public Project scanProject() {
038    return scanProject(bach.path().root());
039  }
040
041  public Project scanProject(Path directory) {
042    log("Parse directory %s".formatted(directory));
043    if (!Files.isDirectory(directory)) throw log(new Error("Not a directory: " + directory));
044
045    var projectName =
046        bach.configuration()
047            .projectOptions()
048            .name()
049            .orElse(Configuration.computeDefaultProjectName(directory));
050    var projectVersion =
051        bach.configuration()
052            .projectOptions()
053            .version()
054            .orElse(Configuration.computeDefaultProjectVersion());
055    log("Find all module-info.java files of %s %s...".formatted(projectName, projectVersion));
056
057    var projectSpaces = scanProjectSpaces(directory);
058
059    return Project.of(projectName, projectVersion).with(projectSpaces);
060  }
061
062  public ProjectSpaces scanProjectSpaces(Path directory) {
063    var moduleInfoFiles = bach.explorer().findModuleInfoJavaFiles(directory);
064    var size = moduleInfoFiles.size();
065    log("Found %d module-info.java file%s".formatted(size, size == 1 ? "" : "s"));
066    if (size == 0) throw log(new Error("No module-info.java found"));
067
068    var tests = new TreeMap<String, DeclaredModule>();
069    var mains = new TreeMap<String, DeclaredModule>();
070
071    var isTestModule = isModuleOf("test", "test");
072    var isMainModule = isModuleOf("main", "*");
073
074    for (var path : moduleInfoFiles) {
075      if (path.startsWith(".bach")) continue;
076      var declaration = scanDeclaredModule(path);
077      if (isTestModule.test(path)) {
078        tests.put(declaration.name(), declaration);
079        continue;
080      }
081      if (isMainModule.test(path)) {
082        mains.put(declaration.name(), declaration);
083        continue;
084      }
085      throw new IllegalStateException("Path not handled: " + path);
086    }
087
088    var mainSpace =
089        new ProjectSpace(
090            "main",
091            List.of(),
092            // TODO bach.configuration().projectOptions().mainRelease().orElse(0)
093            0,
094            new DeclaredModules(List.copyOf(mains.values())));
095    var testSpace =
096        new ProjectSpace(
097            "test",
098            List.of(mainSpace),
099            Runtime.version().feature(), // or 0
100            new DeclaredModules(List.copyOf(tests.values())));
101
102    var spaces = new ArrayList<ProjectSpace>();
103    if (!mains.isEmpty()) spaces.add(mainSpace);
104    if (!tests.isEmpty()) spaces.add(testSpace);
105    if (spaces.isEmpty()) throw new IllegalStateException("All spaces are empty?!");
106
107    return new ProjectSpaces(List.copyOf(spaces));
108  }
109
110  static Predicate<Path> isModuleOf(String space, String... configuration) {
111    if (configuration.length == 0) return path -> false;
112    if (configuration.length == 1 && configuration[0].equals("*")) {
113      if (space.equals("main")) return path -> true;
114      else return path -> ProjectScanner.isModuleInfoJavaFileForCodeSpace(path, space);
115    }
116    return Stream.of(configuration).map(Path::of).collect(Collectors.toSet())::contains;
117  }
118
119  /** Test supplied path for pointing to a Java module declaration for a given space name. */
120  static boolean isModuleInfoJavaFileForCodeSpace(Path info, String space) {
121    return Collections.frequency(deque(info), space) == 1;
122  }
123
124  /** Convert path element names of the given unit into a reversed deque. */
125  static Deque<String> deque(Path path) {
126    var deque = new ArrayDeque<String>();
127    path.forEach(name -> deque.addFirst(name.toString()));
128    return deque;
129  }
130
131  public static DeclaredModule scanDeclaredModule(Path pathOfModuleInfoJavaOrItsParentDirectory) {
132    var path = pathOfModuleInfoJavaOrItsParentDirectory.normalize();
133    if (Files.notExists(path)) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Path must exist: " + path);
134    var info = Files.isDirectory(path) ? path.resolve("module-info.java") : path;
135    if (Files.notExists(info)) throw new IllegalArgumentException("No module-info in: " + path);
136    var descriptor = ModuleDescriptorSupport.parse(info);
137
138    // Single module in project's base directory?
139    if (info.toString().equals("module-info.java")) {
140      return new DeclaredModule(descriptor, info, Optional.empty(), Folders.of());
141    }
142
143    // ...
144
145    var parent = info.getParent();
146    var directory = parent != null ? parent : Path.of(".");
147    var types = FolderTypes.of(FolderType.SOURCES);
148    var folders = Folders.of(new Folder(directory, 0, types));
149    return new DeclaredModule(descriptor, info, Optional.empty(), folders);
150  }
151
152  public static Folder parseTargetedFolder(Path path, FolderType... types) {
153    if (Files.isRegularFile(path)) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Not a directory: " + path);
154    var version = parseReleaseNumber(PathSupport.name(path));
155    return new Folder(path, version, FolderTypes.of(types));
156  }
157
158  static int parseReleaseNumber(String string) {
159    if (string == null || string.isEmpty()) return 0;
160    var matcher = RELEASE_NUMBER_PATTERN.matcher(string);
161    return matcher.matches() ? Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(1)) : 0;
162  }
163}
